name: TombStones
title: Tomb Stones
author: TehRoach
description:
Creates a Tomb Stone with all your stuff in it when you die

Tomb Stones can't be used as massave chests and need to be mined to get items back, which then leaves a little memorial stone, they can also be damaged and destroyed

Graphic stolen from Hazzard's Gravestones, because I prefer Hazzards graphic to all the other death save MODs, but it isn't working on my copy of Factorio
